snippet.title: Peco Peco, the new way to enjoy jigsaw puzzles in VR. Available on Oculus Quest
snippet.description:
"Relaxing game with tremendous value! Peco Peco is a great addition to anyone’s VR library. Highly recommended!"–BoardGameNick

https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3443173935805435/

Put together giant, colorful, animated 3D jigsaw puzzles in VR. With a level editor: Cut custom 3D puzzles in VR!

Peco Peco is a new way to enjoy jigsaw puzzles thanks to VR. Grab the colorful 3D pieces, snap them, let the model comes to life with sounds and animations. Then create your own puzzles in VR for your friends and family to play, thanks to the in-game level editor.

In VR, 3D puzzles are much more impressive: giant cookies, dancing jelly fruits, entire miniature mythical battles, small magical worlds with floating boats and moving clouds…

3 series: Comfort Food, Diorama, In the Attic
36 models from 33 creators. Some models are even animated!
Bonus experimental series: NASA Perseverance and Ingenuity.
70 different puzzles in total (we're cutting more puzzles regularly, automated updates).
22+ hours of play to finish all the official puzzles
Level editor: Cut your own puzzles in VR for your friends and family to play. 

Upcoming free puzzle series:
Blooming
Space
Cute cars
Swords and Katanas
Full-Size Robots

Community: https://discord.pecopecogame.com
